sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { GetMovieById } from '../../Reducers/MovieReducer' import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import "./MovieDetail.css" export default function MovieDetail() { const {id}=useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const currentMovie = useSelector((state) => state.MovieData.movieById); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(GetMovieById({id})) },[]) return (
{currentMovieDetail ? currentMovieDetail.original_title : ""}
{currentMovieDetail ? currentMovieDetail.tagline : ""}
{currentMovieDetail ? currentMovieDetail.vote_average: ""} {currentMovieDetail ? "(" + currentMovieDetail.vote_count + ") votes" : ""}
{currentMovieDetail ? currentMovieDetail.runtime + " mins" : ""}
{currentMovieDetail ? "Release date: " + currentMovieDetail.release_date : ""}
{ currentMovieDetail && currentMovieDetail.genres ? currentMovieDetail.genres.map(genre => ( <>{genre.name} )) : "" }
SUMMARY
{currentMovie ? currentMovie.overview : ""}
) }
